about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires the More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Blue Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Dive into the calming hues of nature with the Blue Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era. This DLC adds a stunning array of blue tones to your character, from serene oceans to cool skies and lush waterscapes, enhancing your prehistoric landscapes with refreshing, natural beauty of your character.

Features:

  • Serene Blue Shades: Infuse your world with tranquil blue tones, including vibrant ocean blues, gentle sky blues, and the cool shades.

  • Breath of Fresh Air: Create a cooler, calmer atmosphere across your landscapes, adding depth and richness to the environment with your characters colors.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Blue Color Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Blue Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era adds serene blue tones to your world, from vibrant oceans to cool skies. Enhance your animals with refreshing, natural blue hues for a calming, dynamic atmosphere.
